title: State Sensor Initialization PDR (DSP0248 Type 5)
description: Per DSP0248 v1.3.0 Clause 28.7 and DSP0240 v1.2.0 Section 2.5

PDRType.description: uint8; PDR Type 5 = State Sensor Initialization

dataLength.description: uint16; Length of data following this header (calculated automatically).

PLDMTerminusHandle.description: uint16; A handle that identifies PDRs that belong to a particular PLDM terminus

sensorID.description: uint16; ID of the sensor relative to the given PLDM terminus

initConditions.description: bitfield8; Conditions for initialization: [7:5] reserved, [4] terminus online, [3] warm reset, [2] hard reset, [1] subsystem power up, [0] agent restart/update

sensorEnable.description: enum8; Initial operational state: 0 disabled, 1 enabled, 255 do not set

sensorInitMask.description: bitfield8; Mask indicating which of the 8 sensors require initialization (bit 0 for offset 0, etc.)

stateValue0.description: uint8; Initial state for sensor at offset 0: 0-254 value, 255 do not set

stateValue1.description: uint8; Initial state for sensor at offset 1: 0-254 value, 255 do not set

stateValue2.description: uint8; Initial state for sensor at offset 2: 0-254 value, 255 do not set

stateValue3.description: uint8; Initial state for sensor at offset 3: 0-254 value, 255 do not set

stateValue4.description: uint8; Initial state for sensor at offset 4: 0-254 value, 255 do not set

stateValue5.description: uint8; Initial state for sensor at offset 5: 0-254 value, 255 do not set

stateValue6.description: uint8; Initial state for sensor at offset 6: 0-254 value, 255 do not set

stateValue7.description: uint8; Initial state for sensor at offset 7: 0-254 value, 255 do not set

eventConditions.description: bitfield8; Conditions to assess event on mismatch: [7:4] reserved, [3] warm reset, [2] hard reset, [1] power up, [0] agent restart/update
